title: New: I.Am.L. – Lonely In Paradise (Demo)
body:
**I.**

**Am.L.** Björk channeling demo gained her numerous early plaudits, much for it’s experimental nature, oozing with confidence throughout. Her second offering, a demo of _Lonely In Paradise_, is another over the top number, utilising her fantastic vocal, yet hinting at a more mainstream approach, not too far from Florence and the Machine or 2014 buzzband, Vaults. Check it out below.
